looking-to-join: Looking to join an existing team instead? Log In

our-goal-copy: Our goal is to eliminate the hassle of localization by providing tools to automate, integrate, and better manage your translations. Lokalise is a better way for growth-minded businesses to expand their mobile apps, games, software or digital content into multiple languages.
hero-copy: Whether it’s your cloud file storage, task management, or communication tools, integrate Lokalise with thousands of other apps on Zapier to automate your workflow.
by-signing-up: By signing up, you accept our <u>Terms of Service</u> and <u>Privacy Policy</u>.
